extendedInfo.description: Personalize your phone's sounds with this great application!A high-quality Scary Ringtone APP!The most popular scary ringtones on the market, It provides 60+ funny sounds or music. Some of the ringtones will make you laugh, very scary! you will get your favorite ringtone.Scary Ringtones contains more scary audios. It can be set as phone contact ringtone, SMS ringtone and Alarm ringtone.Features:- Set as ringtone, assign to contacts- Set as alarm and timer sound- Set as SMS ringtone- Set as notification ringtone- move to SD card.How to Use------* Tap/touch the ringtone icon to play the ringtone* Press for options including saving as a default ringtone, assign the ringtone to a contact, set as notification, Alarm etc.* Press Menu key for even more options such as Ringtone and App preferences.NOTE:. "Set as Alarm" command will not affect existing alarms, only the new ones you create. You can delete existing alarm and create new one.If you are a ringtones fan,the specific app is worthy of collection.You can set cell phone ringtones,messages ringtones and alarm clock ringtones by the app.please stay Connected soon we are launching more categories of ringtones such as:-Sound Effects Ringtones -- published-Christmas ringtones -- published-3D Sounds Ringtones-Chimes and Bells Ringtones-Funny Sayings Ringtones-Digital Ringtones-Chimes and Bells Ringtones-Sound Effects Ringtones-Animal Sounds Ringtones-Techno Remix Ringtones-Funny Morning Alarm Ringtones-Business Ringtones-Exotic RingtonesAbout permissions:1.NETWORK COMMUNICATION & FULL INTERNET ACCESSYou don't have to spend money for this app, thanks to the Ad support! :)To display AdMob ads this permissions are needed.we understand your privacy so we DON'T spam, its not in our DNA.2.READ CONTACT DATA and WRITE CONTACT DATAWe need these permissions in order to set contact ringtones in the app. Without this it's impossible to offer the "set as contact ringtone" feature which many of you appreciate. We DO NOT read, transfer, store or use any of your personal information or contact data. This permission has always been required - we did not add it recently.3.READ PHONE STATE AND IDENTITYwe need this permission to turning on an device's sound on when a call comes in.(ie set contact ringtones)4.STORAGEMODIFY/DELETE USB STORAGE CONTENTS and MODIFY/DELETE SD CARD CONTENTSThis permission is required so you can store this app on your SD Card.5.SYSTEM TOOLSWe need this permission to allow you to select us as your default ringtone picker.If you have any Queries please reach us http://euphonyringtones.blogspot.in/

reviews.title: Sweet ringtones!
